Glossary¶

Terminology¶

A¶

B¶

BitShares Blockchain
(instead of “BitShares”)
Blockchains Consensus
agreement about the validity rules for transactions, and the order in which they have been observed by the blockchain
Blockchain Protocol
Block Producer
(Witness)
BTS Holder
(instead of shareholder / stakeholders)

C¶

D¶

Delegated Proof of Stake
(DPoS)

E¶

F¶

G¶

Governance
—

H¶

I¶

J¶

K¶

L¶

M¶

MPA
Market Pegged Asset

N¶

Native Core Token BTS
(instead of “BTS”)

O¶

P¶

Proof-of-Work
(PoW)

Q¶

R¶

S¶

Seed Node

Seed nodes are the first nodes of the network.It allows other nodes to get started by connecting to them.

ns BitAssets are owned by the BitShares Committee. (e.g. BitUSD, BitCNY, BitEUR, BitGold etc) A SmartCoin (synonym for MPA) is a crypto-currency that always has 100% or more of its value backed by the BitShares core currency (BTS), to which they can be converted at any time, as collateral in a collateralized loan.

T¶

Token
(instead of asset)

U¶

Units

(instead of shares of an asset/token)

test
In BitShares-Core unit test files locate in a /test/ folder. They are meant to ensure that the code behaves the right way.

V¶

W¶

Working Budget
(instead of reserves or treasury)

X¶

Y¶

Z¶
